content: without having to make a separate row of chains first my pretty peaceful poncho video has a tutorial for this at the 12 39 time mark https //youtu be/ftufmp2xta0 si=3srtu4bljykzmiw2 chainless starting double_crochet csdc an alternative to a chain 3 to begin a row of double_crochet that gives nice straight edges my pretty peaceful poncho video has a tutorial for this at the 16 20 time mark https //youtu be/ftufmp2xta0 si=3srtu4bljykzmiw2 pattern notes the whole blanket is double_crochet stitches both the main color and the contrast color of yarn are carried throughout the whole blanket in the tapestry crochet style crochet over the color you are not using by laying it on top of the row of stitches below and crochet over it to hide it change colors by yarning over with the new color as the last yarn over of the last stitch in the old color here is the video tutorial that shows how to do this https //youtu be/9ugpv_rdbcu each square block of the chart below represents 2 double_crochet the chart can be read from left to right or right to left you can follow the written color change directions or the chart whichever you prefer work is turned after each row the starting chain 3 or chainless starting double_crochet counts as the first stitch of each row canyon moon rising crochet pattern © 2025 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful canyon moon rising row 1 option a with mc yarn foundation double_crochet 152 sts turn 152 sts or option b with mc yarn chain 154 sts double_crochet in 2nd loop from hook and all chains across turn 152 sts row 2 with mc chain 3 or csdc double_crochet in next 17 sts attaching cc yarn during the last yarn over of the last double_crochet double_crochet in next 2 sts with cc double_crochet in next 36 sts with mc 3 times double_crochet
